long_description: Get the energy you need during rigorous exercise from these chewy, filled-with-liquid PowerBar Gel Blasts! New C2 Max carbohydrate blend uses a mix of glucose and fructose that results in greater absorption, producing more energy than glucose alone. Easy-to-chew pieces provide 100 calories per 6 pieces, making it easy to track caloric intake during long workouts. Resealable pouch and nonstick pieces are gym-bag friendly. Lemon flavor contains 10% of the daily value of vitamin C per serving. Cola flavor contains 50mg of caffeine per serving. All flavors may contain trace amounts of dairy. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Get the energy you need during rigorous exercise from these chewy, filled-with-liquid PowerBar Gel Blasts!
